Package com.safenetinc.luna

Provides a proprietary interface to the Luna HSM.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
LunaAPI This class defines the JNI interface to the LunaAPI native library that is used to connect the JVM to the cryptoki library.
LunaHAStatus Contains information about the current HA status.
LunaSession This class acts as an interface to sessions on the Luna HSM.
LunaSessionManager LunaSessionManager is a collection of methods to make handling sessions easier.
LunaSlotManager This class is used to manage access to SafeNet, Inc Luna hardware security modules (HSMs).
LunaTokenObject An instance of this class represents an object stored on a Luna token.
LunaUtils  
 

Enum Summary
LunaAPI.CKD Encapsulates the PKCS KDF values.
LunaAPI.CKDHP Encapsulates the PKCS DH primitive values.
LunaAPI.CKES Encapsulates the PKCS encryption scheme values.
LunaAPI.CKMS Encapsulates the PKCS HMAC values.
UserRole Enumerates the roles that a user can log in to a token with.
 

Exception Summary
LunaCryptokiException Thrown by the Luna security provider when errors occur in the Cryptoki native library.
LunaException Thrown by the Luna security provider when it encounters an internal error.
LunaKeyLimitException Thrown by the Luna security provider when a key usage limit has been exceeded.
LunaPartitionFullException A LunaPartitionFullException is thrown when the persistent object limit for the logged-in partition is reached.
 

Package com.safenetinc.luna Description

Provides a proprietary interface to the Luna HSM.
